title: Intermediate Shaft, Disassemble and Assemble

steps.text: Remove intermediate shaft from transmission - see operation "Intermediate Shaft, Remove and Install"
Press intermediate shaft (6) out of 1st / 2nd gear synchromesh body (4) using KM-523-1 (1), KM-6126 (2) and KM-6223 (3)
Remove needle roller bearings (5) from intermediate shaft

substeps.text: (I) Remove thrust washer (1) from 1st gear (5)
(II) Remove front roller bearing (2) from 1st gear
(III) Remove bushing (3) for roller bearing from 1st gear
(IV) Remove rear roller bearing (4) from 1st gear

steps.text: Check wearing parts for damage and replace as necessary

substeps.text: (I) Remove 1st gear (6) from synchromesh body (1)
(II) Remove spacer (2) from synchromesh body
(III) Remove inner synchroniser ring (3) for 1st gear from
(IV) Remove intermediate synchroniser ring (4) for 1st gear
(V) Remove outer synchroniser ring (5) for 1st gear from

steps.text: Check wearing parts for damage and replace as necessary

substeps.text: (I) Remove synchromesh body (1) from 2nd gear (5)
(II) Remove outer synchroniser ring (2) for 2nd gear from 2nd
(III) Remove intermediate synchroniser ring (3) for 2nd gear
(IV) Remove inner synchroniser ring (4) for 2nd gear from 2nd

steps.text: Check wearing parts for damage and replace as necessary

substeps.text: (I) Remove inner synchroniser ring (1) for 2nd gear from 2nd
(II) Install intermediate synchroniser ring (3) for 2nd gear to
(III) Install outer synchroniser ring (4) for 2nd gear to 2nd
(IV) Install synchromesh body (5) to 2nd gear
(I) Install outer synchroniser ring (2) for 1st gear to
(II) Install intermediate synchroniser ring (3) for 1st gear to
(III) Install inner synchroniser ring (4) for 1st gear to
(IV) Install spacer (5) to synchromesh body
Install 1st gear (2) to 1st/2nd gear synchromesh body
Install rear roller bearing (1) to 1st gear - narrow collar
Install front roller bearing (3) to 1st gear - wide collar
Install bushing (4) for roller bearing

steps.text: 1. Press thrust washer (2) and 1st/2nd gear assembly with synchromesh body (3) onto intermediate shaft (4) using KM-6219 (1)
Install intermediate shaft - see operation "Intermediate Shaft, Remove and Install"

warnings:
If gears are damaged,
always replace entire intermediate shaft assembly. Obtain
appropriate synchroniser assembly repair kits from Aftersales
notes:
(II) Install intermediate synchroniser ring (3) for 2nd gear to
2nd gear
 Observe installed
position (arrows). For enhanced illustration, magnifying glass in
Fig. L5464 shows installation without inner synchroniser ring
